[Character Speed x1]
D3000000 09000000
0032B2D8 3F800000
D2000000 00000000

[Character Speed x1.15 Press B]
D3000000 00000000
0932B2D8 3F800000
0932B29C 41F00000
DD000000 00000002
0932B2D8 3F933333
0932B29C 41F00000
D2000000 00000000

[Game Speed x1]
0932B29C 41F00000

[Game Speed x2]
0932B29C 42700000

[N-S-F Foes X+UP/X+DOWN/X+LEFT]
DD000000 00000440
D3000000 08000000
0052FF48 3F800000
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000480
D3000000 08000000
0052FF48 3DCCCCC0
D2000000 00000000
D3000000 08000000
DD000000 00000420
0052FF48 00000000
D2000000 00000000รง
{N= Normal - S= Slowdown -F= Freeze. You can slowdown and/or freeze any kind of foe with this code. Press L+DOWN to slowdown, L+LEFT to freeze them, L+UP to restore them back to normal.}

[Character Speed x1 v2]
D3000000 08000000
0052FF00 3F800000
D2000000 00000000

D3000000 08000000
0052FF00 3F933333
D2000000 00000000

D3000000 08000000
0052FF00 3FA00000
D2000000 00000000

[Character Speed x1.50 v2]
D3000000 08000000
0052FF00 3FC00000
D2000000 00000000

[No Foes X+UP/X+DOWN]
DD000000 00000440
D3000000 08000000
0052FF40 00000000
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000480
D3000000 08000000
0052FF40 08AC2A80
D2000000 00000000
{Makes the enemies dissapear. They can't hurt you, but on some cases you can hear them or you can bump into them.}

[Camera Mod - 3rd Person-ish]
D3000000 08000000
0052FF30 3EE00000
D2000000 00000000
{When you run, you can see the character almost to the ankles}
